page.title: 01Our Village. Markyate
page.content: {MARKYATE} Markyate is a small village of about 3000 people situated in the country in north Hertfordshire about 35 miles north of London.A lot of the land surrounding Markyate is used for farming.In the summer the fields are an array of colour which makes it look very picturesque. In the winter the fields freeze over and the village often gets snowed up.When the warm summer returns the village gets back to its normal routine with the noise and bustle of traffic travelling along the A5 which is a main road that follows the old Roman Road from London to Chester,known as{WATLING STREET. Just on the edge of the village there is a church and past that there is the {MARKYATE CELL,}a Manor House, which dates back to the 15th Century.
